L1.title: Unit 1: The Heart of a Champion

2: HOWARD IS THE WORLD CHESS CHAMPION.
SHE SHOWS TOTAL DEDICATION TO THIS PROJECT.
THE ATHLETE WON A GOLD MEDAL IN THE RACE.
HE SUFFERED A SERIOUS LEG INJURY.
HARD WORK LED TO HER SUCCESS.
HE FELT A SHARP PAIN IN HIS KNEE.
I NEED TO LEAVE IMMEDIATELY FOR THE AIRPORT.
THE OLD BUILDING COLLAPSED DURING THE STORM.
SHE WANTS TO GO TO MEDICAL SCHOOL.
THE HOTEL STAFF GREETED US POLITELY.
IT TAKES COURAGE TO FACE YOUR FEARS.
HE EXERCISES TO BUILD UP HIS STRENGTH.
HIS PARENTS ALWAYS SUPPORT HIS DREAMS.
THE TRUCK STRUGGLED UP THE STEEP HILL.
HE TOOK PRIDE IN HIS BROTHER'S VICTORY.
THE GRADUATION WAS A VERY EMOTIONAL MOMENT.
FANS SHOWED THEIR ADMIRATION FOR THE ACTOR.
WE SHOULD SHOW RESPECT TO THE ELDERLY.
THE PLANE TOOK OFF ON TIME.
HE HAS HIS HEART SET ON WINNING.
WE NEED TO SPEED UP OUR WORK.
THE CROWD ROSE TO THEIR FEET AND CHEERED.
FRIENDS HELPED CARRY HIM THROUGH THE CRISIS.

L2.title: Unit 2: My Mouth's in Airplane Mode!

2: THE POLICE WARNED THE DRIVER TO SLOW DOWN.
THE CAPTAIN MADE AN ANNOUNCEMENT TO THE PASSENGERS.
NEW RESEARCH SHOWS THAT COFFEE IS HEALTHY.
I LIKE THE FRESH FLAVOR OF THIS FRUIT.
HE IS UNDER GREAT PRESSURE AT WORK.
SHE NORMALLY GOES JOGGING IN THE MORNING.
IT IS HARD TO DISTINGUISH THE TWINS.
COMPUTERS CAN CALCULATE MATH PROBLEMS ACCURATELY.
THE NEW MACHINE FUNCTIONS VERY WELL.
DON'T BLAME ME FOR YOUR MISTAKES.
LOUD NOISE CAN AFFECT YOUR HEARING.
THE PASSENGERS ARE WAITING AT THE GATE.
DON'T DISTRACT ME WHILE I AM DRIVING.
THE SIGNS INDICATE THAT THE ROAD IS CLOSED.
THE CAR WORKS WELL IN COLD CONDITIONS.
WE NEED TO FIND A BETTER SOLUTION.
FRESH VEGETABLES ARE THE MAIN INGREDIENT.
SHE FOLLOWED A RECIPE TO BAKE THE CAKE.
THE TWO CARS ARE SIMILAR IN COMPARISON.
PLEASE REMAIN SEATED DURING THE FLIGHT.
THE SCHOOL PROVIDES FREE LUNCH FOR STUDENTS.
WE HAD A PLEASANT TRIP TO THE BEACH.
I AM USED TO GETTING UP EARLY.
NEEDLESS TO SAY, HE WAS VERY ANGRY.
BELIEVE IT OR NOT, SHE IS SIXTY YEARS OLD.
CAN YOU COME UP WITH A NEW IDEA?
THIS ROOM IS LARGE IN COMPARISON WITH THAT ONE.
HE WENT OUT REGARDLESS OF THE HEAVY RAIN.
